title.rendered: Born To Run is nominated for a Grammy

content.rendered:
Bruce Springsteen’s autobiography Born To Run has been nominated for a Best Spoken Word Grammy Award. Congratulations Bruce!

The Born To Run audiobook, read by Bruce, is available now for download and on CD wherever audiobooks are sold including:

  • Amazon
  • Audible
  • Books-a-Million
  • Barnes & Noble
  • iTunes

Listen to an excerpt of Chapter 29, where Bruce describes the influences that inspired him to write the song and album “Born To Run” here:

The Grammy Awards will be held in New York City on January 28, 2018.
